Name: Kanto
Description: The region of Kanto is well known for their ability to create and utilize technology that allows new or even extinct Pokes to be brought back to the world.  The culture of this region prioritized creativity in all things including scientific insights.

Name: Johto
Description: The Johto region is rich with history, archeology and teaching are seen as extremely important.  Knowing your past will help you understand your future.

Name: Hoenn
Description: The weather in the Hoenn region is unpredictable at best and dangerous at worst.  The people of this region are industrious, hearty and careful to watch the wind.

Name: Sinnoh
Description: Sinnoh is a highly varied region, due to its vast size it encompasses every type of environment you could think of.  This leads the culture to embrace many ways to improve, use what you have no matter what that is.

Name: Unova
Description: Unova was built on strife. wars, battles, alliances, and treaties have made this region what it is today.  Strength pushes its people forward, but strength without thought is folly.

Name: Kalos
Description: The reagan of Kalos is known for its constant pursuit of beauty.  Their culture looks for the beauty in all things, and tries to enhance it everywhere they can.

Name: Alola
Description: A region built on tourism, Alola is a beautiful paradise that will drain your wealth without a second thought.  Everything has a price.

Name: Galar
Description: Galar is the region of warriors. Precision in your craft is the most important aspect whether physical or mental.  Be right, hit your target, make sure, no shortcuts, donâ€™t miss.

Name: Paldea
Description: The region of friendship, Paldea culture embraces people and Pokes and encourages community to a far greater extent than any other region.
